@ Herakler

U need to do something about ur upload speed. Try buying more bandwidth. The downloads are really slow.

The other option would be to slow down a little, i.e upload a movie and seed it for atleast 48 hrs or until it has more than 100 seeders, that way u could stop seeding 1st one and upload the next one.

But take my advice, the 1st option, i.e to increase ur bandwidth is better. Try to get ur upload speed to atleast 100 kb/s. ( More than 500 Kb/s would rocket up the number of seeders.)
